body.name: Corsair MP600 Elite 1TB M.2 PCIe Gen4 x4 NVMe SSD – M.2 2280 – Up to 7,000MB/sec Sequential Read – High-Density 3D TLC NAND – Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 8 hrs 48 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 16 hrs 18 mins
features: Extreme Gen4 Storage Performance: A PCIe Gen4 x4 controller delivers up to 7,000MB/sec sequential read and 6,500MB/sec sequential write speeds, for phenomenal read, write, and response times.
Your PC Made Faster: Load games, boot Windows, open and transfer files, all faster than ever.
High-Speed PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe 1.4 M.2 Interface: Using PCIe Gen4 technology for maximum bandwidth, the MP600 ELITE delivers impressive storage performance.
High-Density 3D TLC NAND: Provides the ideal mix of performance and endurance to keep your drive performing at its best for years.
Outstanding Endurance: Rated for up to 1,200TB Written, the MP600 ELITE’s longevity ensures that it reliably stores your data through many years of use.
body.description: The CORSAIR MP600 ELITE PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe M.2 SSD uses PCIe Gen4 technology to achieve PC boosting sequential read speeds of up to 7,000MB/sec and sequential write speeds of up to 6,500MB/sec. High-density 3D TLC NAND flash memory offers an ideal mix of performance and endurance, while the industry standard M.2 2280 form factor and lack of heatsink makes installation straightforward on desktop and laptop PCs. If you’re looking for impressive storage performance, the MP600 ELITE delivers blazing fast Gen4 speed in a neat, convenient package backed by a reassuring five-year warranty.

productInformation.value: CORSAIR MP600 ELITE 1TB M.2 PCIe Gen4 x4 NVMe SSD – Black

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Speed, High Capacity, High Quality
reviews.reviewText: Holy cow, I love M.2 NVMe SSDs. They are so fast. I upgraded from a regular SSD, it was starting to fill up and show its age and my motherboard had a slot for it, so I went for it. Its very easy to install, just find your slot, pop it in, use a mounting screw and set up in your settings. It has an included heatsink to keep thermals low and it feels just as high quality as all the rest of my Corsair stuff. I am very happy and I highly recommend for anyone looking for a lightning fast NVMe SSD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this SSD for my new build. I wanted to install windows on something that would boot my pc up quick and this did the trick. With this Corsair SSD my pc was able to boot up literally within seconds.Corsair is known for putting out good reliable products so I have full confidence that my pc will be able to run trouble free for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ## Speed Demon Unleashed: My Corsair MP600 Elite 1TB Review
reviews.reviewText: Let's face it, storage struggles are the bane of any gamer's existence. Laggy load times, sluggish responsiveness – they can turn even the most epic game into a frustrating slog. That's why I decided to unleash the speed demon within with the Corsair MP600 Elite 1TB, a PCIe Gen4 NVMe SSD promising blistering-fast performance and enough storage to house my ever-growing game library. But did it live up to the hype, or was it just another storage wannabe? Buckle up, fellow gamers, for a review that'll have you loading screens begging for mercy!**First Impressions:** This sleek black drive arrived looking like a stealthy upgrade for my rig. The included heatsink hinted at its performance potential, and the compact M.2 form factor promised easy installation. From the get-go, it exuded an aura of power and efficiency.**From Lag to Lightspeed:** Booting up with the MP600 Elite was like hitting the nitrous button on my system. Gone were the days of staring at loading screens in frustration. Games launched in a blink, open-world maps streamed seamlessly, and even the most demanding applications felt buttery smooth. It was like I'd ripped out the bottlenecks and replaced them with pure speed channels.**Built for the Long Haul:** But speed isn't everything, especially when it comes to your precious game saves. The MP600 Elite boasts high-density 3D TLC NAND, promising endurance and reliability. While I haven't put it through years of hardcore use yet, knowing it can handle the long haul gives me peace of mind. Plus, the included heatsink kept temps in check, ensuring sustained performance even during intense gaming sessions.**Not Without Its Quirks:** The DRAM-less design is potentially impacting certain tasks, and I noticed slightly slower speeds in heavy workloads compared to some high-end DRAM-enabled drives. Additionally, the heatsink, while effective, might require some case clearance considerations.**The Verdict:** If you're a performance-hungry gamer seeking lightning-fast speeds, ample storage, and reliable endurance, the Corsair MP600 Elite 1TB is a serious contender. Sure, there are minor trade-offs in terms of raw performance under extreme loads and heatsink size, but for the price, overall speed boost, and peace of mind, it's a true game-changer. So, ditch the storage lag and unleash your inner speed demon – the MP600 Elite awaits! Now, excuse me while I go conquer some digital worlds at warp speed – thanks, Corsair, for the upgrade!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tons of space
reviews.reviewText: This SSD has awesomely fast speeds and a ton of storage. It worked perfectly out of the box and I was able to transfer files very quickly. I wish SSDs would come with a few of the common mounting screws, especially the higher end ones - but besides that, I have no complaints with this SSD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Corsair has done it again
reviews.reviewText: Corsair once again making an excellent product. I was able to install this M.2 SSD with ease and it runs like a top, excellent for gamers and at a great price as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This SSD is incredibly fast and super easy to install into my PC or PS5. The included heatsink is a great addition as well to keep temps low. The read/write speeds are top tier.
